name: Facerane - Facebook more friendly
description:
Facebook simple theme based on the Jonaska "Facebook Redesign" design on DeviantART. Color : more blue, more black, with white also...
I don't want to make a theme who destroys your eyes like the others, so all is clean...
additional_info: Work in progress ! I love feedbacks ! ;) Issues known : problems with Chrome and placement of elements... 05/07/2012 : - some fix 13/06/2012 : - Facebook update their codes, some fix 15/05/2012 : - fix in messages page, - some fix and improvements... 11/05/2012 : - fix text color in the search bar (grey -> white), - improvements in albums and photos pages, 10/05/2012 : - fix posts page, - fix some pages, 08/05/2012 : - lot of improvements, - fix pages titles, - fix differents pages in groups, - fix old profiles (need improvements), and others good things... 07/05/2012 : - first release of the design. [Im' french, so the comments in the source are in my language.]
